name: Dungeon Rush (itch) (killiyun)
description:
Dungeon Rush is a short experiment with procedural generation. It was made in only a couple of weeks and does contain a few issues. I recommend using the OS-specific builds below for a more stable experience.

Credits

Developed by me and Piers Jonkers (https://github.com/bobtie658/)

Assets

Stone sound effects by Zapsplat

Spike trap sound by Deathscyp (CC0)

Ladder sound by Pashee (CC-BY 3.0)

Damage and pickup sounds by Prof.Mudkip (CC-BY 3.0)

Game over noise by wobesound (CC0)

Game music by Eric Matyas

Dungeon art and sprites by Buch (CC-BY 3.0) with Abram Connelly as the asset sponsor

Clock sprites by MSavioti (CC0)

Character sprites by Yamilian (CC-BY-SA 3.0)

Button prompt art by Nicolae Berbece (CC0)

Spike animation and apple sprites by Stealthix (CC0)
